Title: Relates to licensure by endorsement of certain registered professional nurses and licensed practical nurses
Summary: Provides for the licensure by endorsement of certain registered professional nurses and licensed practical nurses who hold a valid license to practice professional or practical nursing in a territory of the United States and have actively practiced nursing in a territory of the United States for two of the preceding three years without having their license acted against by the licensing authority of any jurisdiction.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to licensure by endorsement of certain registered professional nurses and licensed practical nurses
